title: Weekly Product Pulse: App Stability & User Experience
overview: This week's pulse highlights critical concerns regarding app stability, performance, and financial transparency. Users report frequent glitches, slow load times, and significant dissatisfaction with fees. UI/UX feedback indicates a need for improved navigation and key feature additions.

themes.name: Slow, Glitches
themes.summary: Users frequently report app crashes, significant lagging, and misbehavior during order execution, severely impacting platform reliability.

themes.name: Fees & Financial Concerns
themes.summary: Frequent complaints about high taxes, charges, and alleged excessive billing persist, with some users reporting unauthorized position exits.

themes.name: UI/UX
themes.summary: Despite some positive feedback, users report a cumbersome interface and request crucial features like better portfolio organization.

actions: Prioritize investigation and resolution of reported app crashes and lagging during order execution to improve stability.
Review fee structures and communication for transparency, addressing concerns about perceived overcharging and unauthorized actions.
Explore UI/UX improvements for detailed investment views and portfolio organization, such as separate folders for holdings.
